Reading mode is designed so that you have a dictionary at hand to look up words and translations quickly while doing other things on your device.
It is very useful when you are reading a PDF, accessing another application or even surfing the internet, reading mode serves as a backup for those moments if you forget a word or its meaning!
* Note * To use reading mode you must be Android version 8.0 (Oreo) or higher. Also make sure you allow apps to work in the background, otherwise you will be subject to errors!
